channel.title: HELP plz its about clients
channel.description: how would i chnage the color of text in the client like right now its normal jsut yello but without typing white: or red: i want it to automatically do that any ideas? and how do i change the admin mod crowns in client

item.title: HELP plz its about clients

item.description:
@alexdevinson wrote:

In RSC, it’s defined in the java what each color modifier means. I recommend you examine your code and use a “search” tool to find the color your looking for.
